product_name: Polarmax AYG Tech Silkweight Underwear Crew Shirt - Youths' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether worn alone in mild weather or under a fleece on cold days, the Polarmax AYG Tech Silkweight long underwear crew top lets young explorers stay comfortable during outdoor adventures. Lightweight, breathable polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Flatlock seams minimize rubbing and chafing. Closeout.
